text: Oqil Ghaybulloyevich Oqilov (, Oqil Ghaybulloyevich Oqilov; ; born 2 February 1944) is a Tajikistani politician. He was the Prime Minister of Tajikistan from 20 December 1999 to 23 November 2013. He is a member of the People's Democratic Party of Tajikistan. ==Other websites== *AKILOV, Akil Gaibullayevich International Who's Who, accessed September 3, 2006. Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Tajikistan
title: Oqil Oqilov
